title: Goldman Sachs' Top Economist Says Economy Is Growing Faster
teaser: Jan Hatzius believes the U.S. economy is now growing at an above-trend pace - its fastest since the financial crisis.
contentencoded:
Goldman Sachs’ top economist, Jan Hatzius, has made a pronouncement that just might be music to investors’ ears: the U.S. economy is now growing at an above-trend pace — its fastest since the financial crisis.

Joe Weisenthal,Â executive editor at Business Insider, joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson to discuss.
